HOSTFORCE


![](https://clients.hostforce.com/final-hostforce.png)


Special pricing for a limited time so that people can check us out.


All nodes are on dual power in the SolidSpace datacenter out of Winston, Salem NC.


Hostforce Unmanaged Solus/OpenVZ


1GB Ram  
1/4 Core  (or 1/2 core if you count hyperthreading)  
10GB SSD RAID10 Disk  
500GB IP transfer gigabit uplinks
1 IPv4 (more available in the cart)
1 IPv6 (more on request)  
PPP/TUN/TAP control  
rDNS control  


1.25/month or $12/year


Monthly - [ORDER NOW](https://clients.hostforce.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=16)  
Annual - [ORDER NOW](https://clients.hostforce.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=56)

2XL5640

We also have Colocation, Dedicated Servers, Block Storage, SmarterMail Email and Management.


Test IP/Looking Glass:

Refunds: 7 Days for accounts without abuse or ToS violations. ToS here: http://www.hostforce.com/terms-of-service.html
